title: Designing Strategies to Attract Healthcare Workforce in Rural and Remote Areas

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Learning rural healthcare workforce recruitment strategies through smartphone-based VR simulations and regional case studies, cultivating solution design skills for real-world application

learning_goals: Apply qualitative research methods (case studies/interviews) for analyzing rural healthcare demand with 80% accuracy.
Design three strategies to attract medical personnel tailored to local community characteristics and validate them via VR simulation.
Identify three or more effective components of recruitment messaging through analysis of real job postings.

resources: Regional Healthcare Workforce Recruitment Announcement Samples
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
